harvestR 1.0.0

  • Changelog

Harvest API v2 get request wrapper

get_request.Rd

Submits get requests to the Harvest API v2 with retry functionality. Errors are messaged to the execution environment and set to NULL allowing user-facing function returns to provide data frame output.

get_request(
  url = NULL,
  user = NULL,
  key = NULL,
  email = NULL,
  auto_retry = F,
  verbose = F,
  ...
)

Arguments

url

Character url of the get request.
user

Character account number (e.g. user = '12345') for authentication. Register at Harvest Developers.
key

Character key (e.g. key = 'Bearer <secret key>') for API authentication. Register at Harvest Developers.
email

Character email address for API call. (Optional)
verbose

Logical scalar. Should the function provide verbose messaging back on each step?
...

Internally used to indicated that the call is a retry.

Value

response object

References

https://id.getharvest.com/developers https://help.getharvest.com/api-v2 https://github.com/r-lib/httr https://curl.haxx.se/libcurl/c/CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION.html
